summary: A simple mod that makes the dragonplate armor that you need 100 level smithing to craft better than Daedric armor which needs 90 level smithing.
descriptionHtml:
A simple mod that makes the dragonplate armor that you need 100 level smithing to craft better than Daedric armor which needs 90 level smithing.

I've always wondered why Daedric armor was be better than dragon armor, so I raised the ratings of dragonplate to be slightly better than daedric. the prices have also been changed. keep in mind this does not change the stats of daedric armor
author: RoRl62
